newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Linens 'n Things raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Linens 'n Things raised.

text.p: Piper Jaffray said it upgraded Linens 'n Things Inc to buy from neutral.
-- said believes strong same-store sales trends seen in the second quarter have continued, so far, into the third quarter.
-- said believes company will open 23 superstores and close two stores in 1997. In 1998, expects company to open 28 new stores.
-- expects sales to rise by 22 percent to $849 million in 1997, with a three to four percent increase in same-store saels.
-- expects diluted earnings per share to increase to $1.18 per share in 1997 from $0.78 a share in 1996.
